trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som håndterer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler delegate will be called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som er angitt i WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler representanten skal kalles når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Part events by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Siden utviklere kan angi egendefinerte behandlingsprogrammer for webdelen hendelser ved å legge til en `OnDisplayModeChanged` attributt til den `<asp:webpartmanager>` element i en side, og tilordne en egendefinert navn for attributtet.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Et egendefinert behandlingsprogram kan også tilordnes programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du tilordner programmatisk hendelsesbehandling [NIB: slik: koble denne hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet metoder på hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
